fields.name: ContentValidation
fields.description: The collection of content validation properties

fields.name: ExpectedHTTPStatusCode
fields.description: Validate that the WebTest returns the http status code provided.

fields.name: IgnoreHTTPStatusCode
fields.description: When set, validation will ignore the status code.

fields.name: SSLCertRemainingLifetimeCheck
fields.description: A number of days to check still remain before the the existing SSL cert expires.  Value must be positive and the SSLCheck must be set to true.

fields.name: SSLCheck
fields.description: Checks to see if the SSL cert is still valid.
